name: Bash-includes
tagline: Scripts for a shellscript includes library to ease some aspects of bash shellscripting
body: Welcome to Bash Includes Library, a number of bash shellscript include files to ease script writing by mimicking nawk or C function calls, not to invent frequent used tools over and over. The library also is to promote more structured script programming.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
